titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 743) to amend the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide additional safeguards for Social Security and Supplemental Security Income beneficiaries with representative payees, to enhance program protections, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the Senate amendment to the bill (H.R. 743) to amend the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide additional safeguards for Social Security and Supplemental Security Income beneficiaries with representative payees, to enhance program protections, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 108-417, by Mr. Linder.

It shall be in order to consider in the House, without intervention of any point of order, a motion offered by the Chairman of the Committee on Ways and Means or his designee that the House concur in the Senate amendment to H.R. 743.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 145.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 520.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 226 - 197 (Roll no. 22).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendment to H.R. 743, the Social Security Protection Act of 2003.
